body:
#### PR description:

Bug fix of the alignment code. It expects to return corrected vertical shifts with respect to the beam center. The bug was found following the discussion with PRO POG experts: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1342088/, and fix is summarized in https://indico.cern.ch/event/1349872/#14-2023-alignment-status-updat

#### PR validation:

Tested with CMSSW_13_0_3

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

The fix is needed for 2024 PCL
